product.name: Banana
product.description: Our bananas came from the best green jungles. It is gathered and safely as well. It is full of potassiom and very good for the human body.

product.name: Raspberries
product.description: Our raspberries came only from the best farms. It is very sweet and full of vitamin C, iron and antioxidants. It is recommended to eat it with jams or ice cream.

product.name: Avocado
product.description: It's recently picked. It is very fresh and ripe produced only on the best farms. It is creamy and very nutritious.

product.name: Grapes
product.description: This sweet and juicy grapes is just the dessert that you might be looking for. It is very nutritious and keeps the human body healthy.

product.name: Lime
product.description: Our sour lime is the best to mix with drinks and liquor for the best tasting.

product.name: Strawberries
product.description: This low-hanging fruit that we offer is sweet and and tasty. It is gathered and produced in the best farms where growing strawberries is suitable and sustainable.

product.name: Melons
product.description: We offer the sweetest and the juiciest melon from the cheapest but the best farm. It is gathered sustainably and safely.

product.name: Watermelon
product.description: Our watermelon that came from only the most prestigious of farms not only will sate your hunger but will also quench your thirst.

product.name: Mango
product.description: The sweetest mango you can taste.

product.name: Water
product.description: Your standard bottled spring water. Green market brand provides the best water quality for quick and healthy hydration. Amount: 500ml

product.name: Juice
product.description: Freshly squeezed orange juice. Amount: 500ml

product.name: Milk
product.description: Partly skimmed 2% milk from our best farms. Amount: 1L

product.name: Tea

product.name: Smoothies

product.name: Wine

product.name: Chickpeas

product.description: Natural and delicious. Enjoy our deluxe trail mix blend made from the finest assortment of nuts and berries. This mix is the healthy snack your body craves to get you through the day!
